cast.name: 希薇娅·克洛卡 Silvia Colloca

writer.name: 希薇娅·克洛卡 Silvia Colloca

this_title: Made in Italy with Silvia Colloca Season 1
trans_title: 意大利制造：跟随希薇娅·克洛卡 第一季
introduction: Silvia Colloca visits three regions of Italy that are close to her heart - Abruzzo, Le Marche and Molise - to re-discover authentic 'cucina povera' (peasant cuisine), meet locals and share the true Italian secret of cooking. Every episode sees Silvia meet locals, cooking in their kitchens and allowing viewers a peek inside the true Italian secret of la dolce vita. She will meet chefs and cooks, who open up their Pandora box of culinary delights for viewers.
chinese_title: 意大利制造：跟随希薇娅·克洛卡 第一季
foreign_title: Made in Italy with Silvia Colloca Season 1
